mosinstall.name: SignalLogin
mosinstall.author: Chris Schafflinger
mosinstall.copyright: (C) 2008 Christoph Schafflinger. This module is released under the GNU/GPL v2 License
mosinstall.description: Flexible Login-Module for Joomla 1.0.x - can be used as horizontal or vertical Module and supports "skinning".

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: module_theme
param.label: Theme
param.description: The Theme for the Module. Themes are located in /modules/mod_signallogin/ - use 'default' as reference...

param.name: horizontal
param.label: Module orientation
param.description: Default orientation is vertical for left or right module positions. The horizontal orientation is for a compact horizontal module position.

param.name: pretext
param.label: Pre-text
param.description: This is the Text or HTML that is displayed above the login form

param.name: posttext
param.label: Post-text
param.description: This is the Text or HTML that is displayed below the login form

param.name: login
param.label: Login Redirection URL
param.description: What page will the login redirect to after login. If let blank will reload current page

param.name: logout
param.label: Logout Redirection URL
param.description: What page will the logout redirect to after logout. If let blank will reload current page. If set to index.php , it will go to home-page, avoiding unauthorized access messages.

param.name: show_newaccount
param.label: Create account
param.description: Show/Hide the create account text and link

param.name: name_lenght
param.label: Username length
param.description: The length in characters the textbox should have not max. characters the box may contain.

param.name: pass_lenght
param.label: Password length
param.description: The length in characters the textbox should have not max. characters the box may contain.

param.name: login_message
param.label: Login Message
param.description: Show/Hide the javascript Pop-up indicating Login Success

param.name: logout_message
param.label: Logout Message
param.description: Show/Hide the javascript Pop-up indicating Logout Success

param.name: remember_enabled
param.label: Remember-me checkox
param.description: Show/Hide the standard Remember-me checkbox. It is possible to have it checked or unchecked by default or always

param.name: name
param.label: Name/Username
param.description: Choose what to display with the greeting text
